----English----
How to install?
Copy save file to: “C:\Users\Username\Documents\My Games\Skyrim\Saves”
When you load the save, Open the console with "é" key and type "showracemenu" and you can change your race or name.
---------------------------------
Hi. This is a save file for people like me playing skyrim again again and again. it's so boring to first parts isn't it ?
